title: BloomDrop Jhumka: 18K Gold Pink Sapphire & Rice Pearl Cascade Earrings
materials: Rice Pearls. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and finished with a lustrous polish.
features: Featuring a delicate floral design with a central pink sapphire, these jhumka style earrings cascade with diamond simulant studded leaves and a cluster of luminous rice pearls. The layered design adds depth and sophistication. These earrings blend contemporary design with traditional South Indian influences.
occasions: Perfect for a modern bride's reception
or any festive occasion. Equally suitable for upscale parties and cultural events. Also ideal for a modern half-saree function.
description: These earrings offer a unique blend of modern aesthetics and South Indian tradition, making them a statement piece for any jewelry collection. The use of high-quality materials ensures lasting beauty and durability. The intricate floral design and the cascade of pearls add a touch of elegance and sophistication. Light weight and easy to wear.
